mn59:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
mn59:1.3: Atha kho pancakango thapati yenayasma udayi tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam udayim abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho pancakango thapati ayasmantam udayim etadavoca:
mn59:1.4: “kati nu kho, bhante udayi, vedana vutta bhagavata”ti?
mn59:1.6: Sukha vedana, dukkha vedana, adukkhamasukha vedana—
mn59:1.7: ima kho, thapati, tisso vedana vutta bhagavata”ti.
mn59:1.8: Evam vutte, pancakango thapati ayasmantam udayim etadavoca:
mn59:1.9: “na kho, bhante udayi, tisso vedana vutta bhagavata;
mn59:1.12: Yayam, bhante, adukkhamasukha vedana santasmim esa panite sukhe vutta bhagavata”ti.
mn59:2.1: Dutiyampi kho ayasma udayi pancakangam thapatim etadavoca:
mn59:2.2: “na kho, gahapati, dve vedana vutta bhagavata;
mn59:2.4: Sukha vedana, dukkha vedana, adukkhamasukha vedana—
mn59:2.5: ima kho, thapati, tisso vedana vutta bhagavata”ti.
mn59:2.6: Dutiyampi kho pancakango thapati ayasmantam udayim etadavoca:
mn59:2.7: “na kho, bhante udayi, tisso vedana vutta bhagavata;
mn59:2.10: Yayam, bhante, adukkhamasukha vedana santasmim esa panite sukhe vutta bhagavata”ti.
mn59:3.1: Tatiyampi kho ayasma udayi pancakangam thapatim etadavoca:
mn59:3.2: “na kho, thapati, dve vedana vutta bhagavata;
mn59:3.4: Sukha vedana, dukkha vedana, adukkhamasukha vedana—
mn59:3.5: ima kho, thapati, tisso vedana vutta bhagavata”ti.
mn59:3.6: Tatiyampi kho pancakango thapati ayasmantam udayim etadavoca:
mn59:3.7: “na kho, bhante udayi, tisso vedana vutta bhagavata,
mn59:3.10: Yayam, bhante, adukkhamasukha vedana santasmim esa panite sukhe vutta bhagavata”ti.
mn59:3.11: Neva kho sakkhi ayasma udayi pancakangam thapatim sannapetum, na panasakkhi pancakango thapati ayasmantam udayim sannapetum.
mn59:4.1: Assosi kho ayasma anando ayasmato udayissa pancakangena thapatina saddhim imam kathasallapam.
mn59:4.2: Atha kho ayasma anando yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi.
mn59:4.3: Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma anando yavatako ahosi ayasmato udayissa pancakangena thapatina saddhim kathasallapo tam sabbam bhagavato arocesi.
mn59:4.4: Evam vutte, bhagava ayasmantam anandam etadavoca:
mn59:5.1: “santanneva kho, ananda, pariyayam pancakango thapati udayissa nabbhanumodi, santanneva ca pana pariyayam udayi pancakangassa thapatissa nabbhanumodi.
mn59:5.2: Dvepananda, vedana vutta maya pariyayena, tissopi vedana vutta maya pariyayena, pancapi vedana vutta maya pariyayena, chapi vedana vutta maya pariyayena, attharasapi vedana vutta maya pariyayena, chattimsapi vedana vutta maya pariyayena, atthasatampi vedana vutta maya pariyayena.
mn59:5.3: Evam pariyayadesito kho, ananda, maya dhammo.
mn59:5.4: Evam pariyayadesite kho, ananda, maya dhamme ye annamannassa subhasitam sulapitam na samanujanissanti na samanumannissanti na samanumodissanti tesametam patikankham—bhandanajata kalahajata vivadapanna annamannam mukhasattihi vitudanta viharissanti.
mn59:5.5: Evam pariyayadesito kho, ananda, maya dhammo.
mn59:5.6: Evam pariyayadesite kho, ananda, maya dhamme ye annamannassa subhasitam sulapitam samanujanissanti samanumannissanti samanumodissanti tesametam patikankham—samagga sammodamana avivadamana khirodakibhuta annamannam piyacakkhuhi sampassanta viharissanti.
mn59:6.3: Cakkhuvinneyya rupa ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya,
mn59:6.7: kayavinneyya photthabba ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya—
mn59:6.9: Yam kho, ananda, ime panca kamagune paticca uppajjati sukham somanassam idam vuccati kamasukham.
mn59:7.1: Yo kho, ananda, evam vadeyya: ‘etaparamam satta sukham somanassam patisamvedenti’ti, idamassa nanujanami.
mn59:7.3: Atthananda, etamha sukha annam sukham abhikkantataranca panitataranca.
mn59:7.4: Katamancananda, etamha sukha annam sukham abhikkantataranca panitataranca?
mn59:7.5: Idhananda, bhikkhu vivicceva kamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi …pe… pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
mn59:7.6: Idam kho, ananda, etamha sukha annam sukham abhikkantataranca panitataranca.
mn59:8.1: Yo kho, ananda, evam vadeyya: ‘etaparamam satta sukham somanassam patisamvedenti’ti, idamassa nanujanami.
mn59:8.3: Atthananda, etamha sukha annam sukham abhikkantataranca panitataranca.
mn59:8.4: Katamancananda, etamha sukha annam sukham abhikkantataranca panitataranca?
mn59:8.5: Idhananda, bhikkhu vitakkavicaranam vupasama …pe… dutiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
mn59:8.6: Idam kho, ananda, etamha sukha annam sukham abhikkantataranca panitataranca.
mn59:9.3: Katamancananda, etamha sukha annam sukham abhikkantataranca panitataranca?
mn59:9.4: Idhananda, bhikkhu pitiya ca viraga …pe… tatiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
mn59:9.5: Idam kho, ananda, etamha sukha annam sukham abhikkantataranca panitataranca.
mn59:10.3: Katamancananda, etamha sukha annam sukham abhikkantataranca panitataranca?
mn59:10.4: Idhananda, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahana …pe… catuttham jhanam upasampajja viharati.
mn59:10.5: Idam kho, ananda, etamha sukha annam sukham abhikkantataranca panitataranca.
mn59:11.3: Katamancananda, etamha sukha annam sukham abhikkantataranca panitataranca?
mn59:11.4: Idhananda, bhikkhu sabbaso rupasannanam samatikkama, patighasannanam atthangama, nanattasannanam amanasikara ‘ananto akaso’ti akasanancayatanam upasampajja viharati.
mn59:11.5: Idam kho, ananda, etamha sukha annam sukham abhikkantataranca panitataranca.
mn59:12.3: Katamancananda, etamha sukha annam sukham abhikkantataranca panitataranca?
mn59:12.4: Idhananda, bhikkhu sabbaso akasanancayatanam samatikkamma ‘anantam vinnanan’ti vinnanancayatanam upasampajja viharati.
mn59:12.5: Idam kho, ananda, etamha sukha annam sukham abhikkantataranca panitataranca.
mn59:13.3: Katamancananda, etamha sukha annam sukham abhikkantataranca panitataranca?
mn59:13.4: Idhananda, bhikkhu sabbaso vinnanancayatanam samatikkamma ‘natthi kinci’ti akincannayatanam upasampajja viharati.
mn59:13.5: Idam kho, ananda, etamha sukha annam sukham abhikkantataranca panitataranca.
mn59:14.3: Katamancananda, etamha sukha annam sukham abhikkantataranca panitataranca?
mn59:14.4: Idhananda, bhikkhu sabbaso akincannayatanam samatikkamma nevasannanasannayatanam upasampajja viharati.
mn59:14.5: Idam kho, ananda, etamha sukha annam sukham abhikkantataranca panitataranca.
mn59:15.1: Yo kho, ananda, evam vadeyya: ‘etaparamam satta sukham somanassam patisamvedenti’ti, idamassa nanujanami.
mn59:15.3: Atthananda, etamha sukha annam sukham abhikkantataranca panitataranca.
mn59:15.4: Katamancananda, etamha sukha annam sukham abhikkantataranca panitataranca?
mn59:15.5: Idhananda, bhikkhu sabbaso nevasannanasannayatanam samatikkamma sannavedayitanirodham upasampajja viharati.
mn59:15.6: Idam kho, ananda, etamha sukha annam sukham abhikkantataranca panitataranca.
mn59:16.1: Thanam kho panetam, ananda, vijjati yam annatitthiya paribbajaka evam vadeyyum:
mn59:16.2: ‘sannavedayitanirodham samano gotamo aha; tanca sukhasmim pannapeti.
mn59:16.4: Evamvadino, ananda, annatitthiya paribbajaka evamassu vacaniya:
mn59:16.5: ‘na kho, avuso, bhagava sukhamyeva vedanam sandhaya sukhasmim pannapeti;
mn59:16.6: api ca, avuso, yattha yattha sukham upalabbhati yahim yahim tam tam tathagato sukhasmim pannapeti’”ti.
mn59:16.8: Attamano ayasma anando bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditi.
